name: Spirit Shootin Simulator
description:
Uh Oh! You're stuck in the graveyard and can only turn in 4 directions! Shoot as many ghosts as you can before they drop your health to zero!

3 bosses, 3 difficulties (4 if you count the secret one), 4 directions, and a whole bunch of ghosts!

Music by:
- @Kaiholvikmusic (Instagram) (Title screen)
- https://soundcloud.com/jacobpearlmusic (In Game)
And everything else by me! (@Insert_Disc_2 (Twitter))
